turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm at the University of Alabama Birmingham's library, and I want to place an order at the Starbucks there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I haven't said the drink yet but I think I'm going to want a tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want to try almond milk in it. Never had it before, but it's healthier.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you do maybe a splash of honey. No whipped cream, though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a tall caffe mocha with almond milk, and a splash of honey, no whipped cream from the starbucks at the Birmingham University.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing. That's right, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set, your drink will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get a receipt via text.
